PrivateStoreIdParameter.name: privateStoreId
PrivateStoreIdParameter.description: The store ID - must use the tenant ID

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.

OfferIdPathParameter.name: offerId
OfferIdPathParameter.description: The offer ID to update or delete

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription id of the private offers

UseCacheParameter.name: use-cache
UseCacheParameter.description: Determines if to use cache or DB for serving this request

AdminRequestApprovalIdPathParameter.name: adminRequestApprovalId
AdminRequestApprovalIdPathParameter.description: The admin request approval ID to get create or update

RequestApprovalIdPathParameter.name: requestApprovalId
RequestApprovalIdPathParameter.description: The request approval ID to get create or update

PublisherIdParameter.name: publisherId
PublisherIdParameter.description: The publisher id of this offer.

PrivateStoreList.description: Describes the json payload for the list of available private stores (between zero and one, inclusive)

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of PrivateStore list results if there are any.

PrivateStoreProperties.description: Describes the json payload on whether or not the private store is enabled for a given tenant

eTag.description: Identifier for purposes of race condition

collectionIds.description: Gets list of associated collection ids

branding.description: Gets or sets list of branding characteristics

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of offer list results if there are any.

claim.description: Gets or sets the association with Commercial's Billing Account.

allSubscriptions.description: Indicating whether all subscriptions are selected (=true) or not (=false).

subscriptionsList.description: Gets or sets subscription ids list. Empty list indicates all subscriptions are selected, null indicates no update is done, explicit list indicates the explicit selected subscriptions. On insert, null is considered as bad request

enabled.description: Indicating whether the collection is enabled or disabled.

numberOfOffers.description: Gets the number of offers associated with the collection.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of offer list results if there are any.
URL to get the next set of PrivateStore list results if there are any.

offerDisplayName.description: It will be displayed prominently in the marketplace

publisherDisplayName.description: Publisher name that will be displayed prominently in the marketplace

eTag.description: Identifier for purposes of race condition

specificPlanIdsLimitation.description: Plan ids limitation for this offer

updateSuppressedDueIdempotence.description: Indicating whether the offer was not updated to db (true = not updated). If the allow list is identical to the existed one in db, the offer would not be updated.

planDisplayName.description: Friendly name for the plan for display in the marketplace

AdminRequestApprovalsList.description: List of admin request approval resources

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of notifications list results if there are any.

properties.description: The privateStore admin Approval request data structure.

approvedPlans.description: Gets or sets Approved plans ids, empty in case of rejected

plans.description: Gets list of plans with requesters details

collectionIds.description: Gets or sets list of associated collection ids

subscriptionId.description: Gets the subscription id that the user is requesting to add the plan to

subscriptionName.description: Gets the subscription name that the user is requesting to add the plan to

RequestApprovalsList.description: List of admin request approval resources

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of notifications list results if there are any.

properties.description: The privateStore approval request data structure.

offerId.description: Gets or sets unique offer id.

plansDetails.description: Gets or sets the plans details

isClosed.description: Gets a value indicating whether the request is closed

messageCode.description: Gets or sets the request approval message code

justification.description: Gets or sets user's justification for the plan's request

subscriptionId.description: Gets or sets the subscription id that the user is requesting to add the plan to

subscriptionName.description: Gets or sets the subscription name that the user is requesting to add the plan to

QueryRequestApproval.description: Gets the request plans with indication on each plan whether is approved by the admin, has pending request or not requested yet

uniqueOfferId.description: Gets or sets unique offer id.

plansDetails.description: Gets or sets the plans details

messageCode.description: Gets or sets the notification message id

QueryRequestApprovalProperties.description: The details to get the request plans statuses

properties.description: The details to get the request plans statuses

RequestDetails.description: Request details needed to get the plans statuses

subscriptionId.description: Gets or sets the subscription id

isFuturePlansEnabled.description: Gets a value indicating whether future plans is enabled.

messageCode.description: Gets or sets the notification message id

icon.description: Gets or sets the icon url

plans.description: Gets or sets removed plans notifications

isEntire.description: Gets a value indicating whether entire offer is in stop sell or only few of its plans

messageCode.description: Gets or sets the notification message id

icon.description: Gets or sets the icon url

plans.description: Gets or sets removed plans notifications

planId.description: Gets or sets the plan id

planDisplayName.description: Gets or sets the plan display name

messageCode.description: Gets or sets the notification message id

icon.description: Gets or sets the icon url

plans.description: Gets or sets removed plans notifications

acknowledge.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether acknowledge action flag is enabled

dismiss.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether dismiss action flag is enabled

removeOffer.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether remove offer action flag is enabled

TransferOffersResponse.description: The transfer items response. The response contains two lists that indicate for each collection whether the operation succeeded or failed

operation.description: Operation to perform (For example: Copy or Move)

offerIdsList.description: Offers ids list to transfer from source collection to target collection(s)

CollectionsToSubscriptionsMappingPayload.description: The subscriptions list to get the related collections

CollectionsToSubscriptionsMappingPropert.description: The subscriptions list to get the related collections

CollectionsToSubscriptionsMappingRespons.description: A map of collections subscriptions details
Collections - subscriptions mapping details, map key is collectionId. In case subscriptions list is null or empty: no subscription from the list is related to that collection.

collectionsSubscriptionsMappingDetails.description: Collection name and related subscriptions list

PrivateStoreOperation.description: Set the Operation for the POST method. Ping or Delete

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Marketplace operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of Microsoft.Marketplace operations supported by the Microsoft.Marketplace resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates Microsoft.Marketplace service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

IdentityType.description: The type of identity that creates/modifies resources
